attributes.documentation:
@title Liquid staking pool
  * For the high-level description of the pool operation please refer to the paper.
Pool manages withdrawal keys and fees. It receives ether submitted by users on the ETH 1 side
and stakes it via the deposit_contract.sol contract. It doesn't hold ether on it's balance,
only a small portion (buffer) of it.
It also mints new tokens for rewards generated at the ETH 2.0 side.
attributes.name: ILido

attributes.documentation: @notice Stop pool routine operations
attributes.name: stop

attributes.documentation: @notice Resume pool routine operations
attributes.name: resume
setOracle
setTreasury
setInsuranceFund

attributes.documentation:
@notice Set fee rate to `_feeBasisPoints` basis points. The fees are accrued when oracles report staking results
@param _feeBasisPoints Fee rate, in basis points
attributes.name: setFee

attributes.documentation: @notice Set fee distribution: `_treasuryFeeBasisPoints` basis points go to the treasury, `_insuranceFeeBasisPoints` basis points go to the insurance fund, `_operatorsFeeBasisPoints` basis points go to node operators. The sum has to be 10 000.
attributes.name: setFeeDistribution

attributes.documentation: @notice Returns staking rewards fee rate
attributes.name: getFee

attributes.documentation: @notice Returns fee distribution proportion
attributes.name: getFeeDistribution
receiveMevTxFee
setWithdrawalCredentials

attributes.documentation: @notice Returns current credentials to withdraw ETH on ETH 2.0 side after the phase 2 is launched
attributes.name: getWithdrawalCredentials

attributes.documentation:
@dev Sets given address as the address of LidoMevTxFeeVault contract
@param _mevTxFeeVault MEV and Tx Fees Vault contract address
attributes.name: setMevTxFeeVault
handleOracleReport

attributes.documentation:
@notice Adds eth to the pool
@return StETH Amount of StETH generated
attributes.name: submit
withdraw

attributes.documentation: @notice Gets the amount of Ether controlled by the system
attributes.name: getTotalPooledEther

attributes.documentation: @notice Gets the amount of Ether temporary buffered on this contract balance
attributes.name: getBufferedEther
getBeaconStat

attributes.documentation: @dev This is a mock. Don't use in production.
attributes.name: OracleMock
